frontmatter.title: Learn Asynchronous JavaScript and XML(AJAX)
frontmatter.description:
Asynchronous JavaScript and XMLAJAX enables you to:
Read data from a web server  after the page has loaded, Update a web page without reloading the page, Send data to a web server - in the background.You gonna like it.Lets look how you can update data asynchonously with Ajax
